article.title: Argon ST Awarded Next Phase of DARPA Robust Surface Navigation Program
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Argon ST Incorporated has been awarded a contract for Phase 2A of the Robust Surface Navigation program with Options for Phase 2B and 2C from the Defense Advanced Research Projects Agency (DARPA) Strategic Technology Office. The contract is valued at approximately $6.5 million.
